resources.string: Check your Internet connection or try again later
Failed to fetch %s due to a network error, please try again later
Unable to process data from Eljur
School domain is the part before \".eljur.ru\" in your school\'s eljur address.\n\nExample: For eljur with address \"1399.eljur.ru\" the school domain would be \"1399\"
Entered school domain doesn\'t exist or is temporary unavailable. Please check if you\'ve entered it right
Apheleia only supports students and parents accounts
Your access token is no longer valid, you need to sign in again

Beta:
This is the first release of Apheleia, and it hasn't been tested on real users. So if you notice any problems, report them on the Google Play Apheleia page

Analytics and Privacy Policy:
Apheleia uses Google Analytics to anonymously collect app usage data and report errors. None of you personal data is sent. This data is used to make Apheleia better.
Failed to update weeks/periods info. Error was reported

Apheleia has detected, that Eljur returned less weeks than it did last time.

That may have happened due to the start of a new school year.

Do you want to perform a reinitialization, so that you can see the new school year?

If you believe that this is an error, you may ignore this
If network to be disconnected or server error occurs during reinitialization, you will be logged off from the app and will have to log in again.
During reinitialization, connection to Eljur was lost. Check your Internet connection or try again later.\n\nYou will have to log into Apheleia again. The app will now be closed
Unable to sync weeks/periods due to a network error
No internet connection and selected week is not saved!
No diary found for selected week
No internet connection and selected period is not saved!
No marks found for selected period
Schedule is not set for selected week
You have to select at least one receiver

Apheleia can't use instant new messages notifications like the official Eljur app

Nonetheless, Apheleia can once in a while check your inbox for new messages and notify you if there are any. Though it will increase battery usage insignificantly and traffic usage proportionally to the total count of unread messages you have, hence this will work only with WIFI connection by, until you allow to use cell network in settings.

If you have many unread messages, and want to use this option, I highly recommend you use "Read All" option on the Eljur website.

Do you want to enable this option? You can always turn it on/off in settings
First new messages check will count all you unread messages as new

Allowing messages check via cell network will increase your mobile traffic usage significantly.\n\nEach unread message in your inbox will cost you approximately 1.5 megabytes of traffic per month, this includes all of the unread messages you have, not only new ones.

1. To switch week or period, click the calendar button in app bar

2. Marks with comments are highlighted with a circle, click them to see the comment

3. If the new week has started, but you don't see it in Apheleia, try using "Sync weeks/periods" option from "three dots" menu

4. To switch folders in messages, click the button next to the "three dots" button in the app bar

5. You can scroll to a particular weekday in schedule and diary by tapping it's name at the bottom bar

6. To switch current student, click the button next to the current student name in the navigation drawer

You can always open this from the settings
Changes will be applied after app restart
